# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security vulnerabilities by opening a GitHub Security Advisory or contacting the maintainers directly.

## Security Features

- Secret scanning enabled in CI/CD
- Dependency vulnerability scanning (Dependabot)
- Non-root container execution
- Pinned base images and dependencies
